user.title: Azure Event Hub
user.description: Please enter the information for your Azure Event Hub.

filter.title: Filter for Event Hub
filter.description: Please enter the filters for which comma-seperated domains and entities to send to Event Hub.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please try again.
error.invalid_config: Invalid config: please supply either all the details (namespace, name, SAS Policy and Key) or the connection string.
error.invalid_connection_string: The connection string is not formatted correctly.
error.invalid_instance: The instance name is not correct.
error.invalid_sas: The SAS Policy or Key are not correct.

abort.already_configured: There is already a connection to Azure Event Hub configured.
